mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD JOIN (SELECT BF_FILE_ID, LISTAGG(FILE_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY FILE_NAME) AS FILE_NAME FROM BOARD_FILE GROUP BY BF_FILE_ID) ON BOARD_ID=BF_FILE_ID WHERE PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{boardTitle} ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{boardTitle}

SELECT BOARD.*,B.*,MEMBER_PICTURE FROM BOARD JOIN (SELECT BF_FILE_ID, LISTAGG(FILE_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY FILE_NAME) AS FILE_NAME FROM BOARD_FILE GROUP BY BF_FILE_ID) B ON BOARD_ID=BF_FILE_ID JOIN MEMBER ON WRITER_USID = USID WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND WRITER_USID = #{writerUsid}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT TRADE_USID FROM TRADE_LIST WHERE TRADE_BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
